title: Bushfires: your safety and survival
brief_description: Made especially for television information purposes, this film is introduced by Sir Henry Bolte, (Premier of Victoria in 1969). It tells how to prevent, prepare against, and fight bush fires. It also explains how to defend your home, property and life when fire threatens.
